slide.title: Widgets Way Forward
slide.blurb: Gtkhtml was a reasonably typical binding for PHP-GTK, involved 3 step process

list.bullet: Parse C header file to 'defs' format (h2def.py)
Create Overrides file for things that can not be automatically created

slide.blurb: Most GTK widgets are designed to have language bindings, so Apart from getting the C memory management right! - The Overrides file is the key time consumer.

list.bullet: Generator could do with easier handling of resources
It's going to need some work to handle Zend Engine 2
Not all widgets are designed to work on Win32
